TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit MethodData extends System.Object

summary.span: 包含关于 WMI 方法的信息。

span.span: Contains information about a WMI method.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的示例使用类列出有关**Win32_Process**的信息。 The following example lists information about the **Win32_Process.Create** method using the class. 有关 **Win32_Process** 类的详细信息，请参阅 [Windows Management Instrumentation](/windows/desktop/wmisdk/wmi-start-page) 文档。For more information on the **Win32_Process** class, see the [Windows Management Instrumentation](/windows/desktop/wmisdk/wmi-start-page) documentation. MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property InParameters As ManagementBaseObject
public: property System::Management::ManagementBaseObject ^ InParameters { System::Management::ManagementBaseObject ^ get(); };

span.span: Gets the input parameters to the method.

summary.span: 将每个参数都描述为对象的一个属性。

span.span: Each parameter is described as a property in the object.

summary.span: 如果一个参数既是输入参数又是输出参数，则该参数将同时出现在 和 属性中。

span.span: If a parameter is both in and out, it appears in both the and properties.

value.span: 返回一个 ，它包含方法的输入参数。

span.span: Returns a containing the input parameters to the method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 对象中的每个参数都应具有一个 ID 限定符，标识方法调用中参数的顺序。Each parameter in the object should have an ID qualifier, identifying the order of the parameters in the method call. ## 属性值Property Value 包含方法的所有输入参数的。A containing all the input parameters to the method. ## .NET Framework 安全性.NET Framework Security 对直接调用方的完全信任。Full trust for the immediate caller. 此成员不能由部分信任的代码使用。This member cannot be used by partially trusted code. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [从部分受信任的代码使用库](/dotnet/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code)。For more information, see [Using Libraries from Partially Trusted Code](/dotnet/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code). ## Examples 下面的示例使用类列出有关**Win32_Process**的信息。 The following example lists information about the **Win32_Process.Create** method using the class. 有关 **Win32_Process** 类的详细信息，请参阅 [Windows Management Instrumentation](/windows/desktop/wmisdk/wmi-start-page) 文档。For more information about the **Win32_Process** class, see the [Windows Management Instrumentation](/windows/desktop/wmisdk/wmi-start-page) documentation. span.span: Gets the name of the method.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Origin As String
public: property System::String ^ Origin { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取管理类的名称，在该类中第一次将该方法引入到类的继承层次结构。

span.span: Gets the name of the management class in which the method was first introduced in the class inheritance hierarchy.

value.span: 返回一个 值，该值包含方法第一次引入到其继承层次结构的类的名称。

span.span: Returns a value containing the name of the class in which the method was first introduced in the class inheritance hierarchy.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ## 属性值Property Value 表示源管理类名称的字符串。A string representing the originating management class name. ## .NET Framework 安全性.NET Framework Security 对直接调用方的完全信任。Full trust for the immediate caller. 此成员不能由部分信任的代码使用。This member cannot be used by partially trusted code. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [从部分受信任的代码使用库](/dotnet/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code)。For more information, see [Using Libraries from Partially Trusted Code](/dotnet/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code).

span.span: Gets the output parameters to the method.

summary.span: 将每个参数都描述为对象的一个属性。

span.span: Each parameter is described as a property in the object.

summary.span: 如果一个参数既是输入参数又是输出参数，则该参数将同时出现在 和 属性中。

span.span: If a parameter is both in and out, it will appear in both the and properties.

value.span: 返回一个 ，它包含方法的输出参数。

span.span: Returns a containing the output parameters for the method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此对象中的每个参数都应有 ID 限定符来识别方法调用中参数的顺序。Each parameter in this object should have an ID qualifier to identify the order of the parameters in the method call. **ReturnValue**属性是由属性返回的的特殊属性 ，它 包含方法的返回值。The **ReturnValue** property is a special property of the returned by the property and holds the return value of the method. ## 属性值Property Value 一个， 其中包含方法的所有输出参数。A containing all the output parameters to the method. ## .NET Framework 安全性.NET Framework Security 对直接调用方的完全信任。Full trust for the immediate caller. 此成员不能由部分信任的代码使用。This member cannot be used by partially trusted code. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [从部分受信任的代码使用库](/dotnet/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code)。For more information, see [Using Libraries from Partially Trusted Code](/dotnet/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code). ## Examples 下面的示例使用类列出有关**Win32_Process**的信息。 The following example lists information about the **Win32_Process.Create** method using the class. 有关 **Win32_Process** 类的详细信息，请参阅 [Windows Management Instrumentation](/windows/desktop/wmisdk/wmi-start-page) 文档。For more information on the **Win32_Process** class, see the [Windows Management Instrumentation](/windows/desktop/wmisdk/wmi-start-page) documentation. MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Qualifiers As QualifierDataCollection

summary.span: 获取在方法中定义的限定符集合。

span.span: Gets a collection of qualifiers defined in the method.

summary.span: 每个元素都是 类型，并包含诸如\*\* 限定符名称、值和\*\* 风格之类的信息。

span.span: Each element is of type and contains information such as the *qualifier* name, value, and *flavor*.

value.span: 返回一个 ，它包含方法的限定符。

span.span: Returns a containing the qualifiers for the method.
